column5: For more information...  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=12915  Terry from the Final Score asked me to call a week in advance with some numbers. Please post or PM me if you are coming and if you will be bringing guests. The more the merrier, we just want to have enough seating resereved.  -Brian   Slowpoke & Mrs. Slowpoke jjcanoe & maybe Mrs. jjcanoe muskiestudd garyv (depending on weather and health) Woodsman JohnF (depending on weather) fishless Vanselena Canuck2fan (maybe) fishandchips (maybe)
I plan on making it there. Elaine won't be available this time.  Rick
Almost missed this. I'm still planning on it unless the weather does me in, or it's postponed.  JF
I think we're closing in on 10 people so far... editing the first post to keep track
Thanks for the update Rick, was it something we said to her??? -Brian
Not really. Too much talking about fishing for her tastes. I told her sorry " but this group is not likely to be up on the soap opera scene".
Brian I am pretty sure I will be there as well.

I just got off the phone with Terry at the Final Score to confirm our reservation - we're all good! Reservation is under OFC or Ontario Fishing Network.  I reminded Terry about the half price wings and $10 pitchers. He mentioned to me that with larger groups they add a 10% gratuity on the bills for the servers. When you receive you bill have a look for it and tip accordingly or in case they forgot!  -Brian

Okay, Taper had something come up and he will not be attending. So, if anybody was on the fence about attending but didn't want to go because Taper was going to be there.... Just kidding Taper, I just wanted to bump the thread! -Brian
